content: I was wandering how doable it would be to have an attribute like @[mk_iff] that makes a FunLike instance out of a type with some toFun field. I keep seeing proofs that are all := toFun + coe_injective f g h := by cases f; cases g; congr or some variation theoref (say with rintro). I have no idea how mk_iff works though so maybe this is not practical for some reason?
Good, thank you I'll put it on my todo list
Luigi Massacci has marked this topic as resolved.
